      • isInstantiable

        public static boolean isInstantiable(TypeElement elem)
        Checks if the type represented by the given element can be instantiated. This requires the type to be a non-abstract class.

        Note that this method does not check whether the class actually exposes any visible constructors.

        Parameters:
        elem - the type element to check
        Returns:
        true if the type is a non-abstract class, false otherwise

      • isStandaloneInstantiable

        public static boolean isStandaloneInstantiable(TypeElement elem)
        Checks if the type represented by the given element can be instantiated on a stand-alone basis. This requires the type to be a non-abstract class which is defined either at package level, or, if it is an inner class, with a static modifier.

        Note that like the above isInstantiable(TypeElement), this method does not check if the class actually exposes any visible constructors.

        Parameters:
        elem - the type element to check
        Returns:
        true if this type is stand-alone instantiable, false otherwise.

      • getDeclaredMethods

        public static List<ExecutableElement> getDeclaredMethods(TypeElement typeElem)
        Retrieves all directly declared methods of a given type.
        Parameters:
        typeElem - the type element
        Returns:
        a list of all directly declared methods of the given type

      • getDeclaredFields

        public static List<VariableElement> getDeclaredFields(TypeElement typeElem)
        Retrieves all directly declared fields of a given type.
        Parameters:
        typeElem - the type element
        Returns:
        a list of all directly declared fields of the given type

      • getConstructors

        public static List<ExecutableElement> getConstructors(TypeElement typeElem)
        Retrieves all constructors of a given class.
        Parameters:
        typeElem - the type element for the class
        Returns:
        a list of all constructors of the specified class
